Our Core Services

Collection & Transport

Scheduled & compliant collection using specialized vehicles. Safe handling guaranteed.

Treatment & Disposal

State-of-the-art autoclaving & shredding for safe, eco-friendly disposal.

Compliance & Training

Expert guidance on regulations & staff training for proper waste segregation.
